name: Temple Runner
description:
Endless runner game, where you run across a temple themed region, avoiding numerous obstacles, to get to the goal.
-Jump over bushes, anthills, bush fires, holes and other objects.
-Collect jetpacks, and fly high and fast.
-Collect coins along the way, and increase your score as well as beat objectives and other challenges.
-Complete over 40 enthralling levels.
Rated "Indie Game to watch" by the website newindiegamesrater.com.
